page.title: 14LEISURE - A SURVEY
page.content: We did two surveys of leisure, using our own questionnaires, one to all the parents and one for people in the street.{205}replies came from parents and{108}people were interviewed. The most popular activities were: 'man in the street' -{walking} 20-30 year-olds -{gardening} 30-40 " " -{walking} 40-50 " " -{gardening} 50+ " " -{walking} { 78%}of parents thought existing public leisure facilities were inadequate, as did{73%}of the people in the street.
